title: Water Procurement in Biological Contaminated Areas
brief: Priority order and methods for obtaining safe water when biological agents are present.
steps: Step 1: First choice - water in sealed containers. Wash container with soap and water or boil 10 minutes before opening.
Step 2: Second choice (emergency only) - spring water. Boil for at least 10 minutes before drinking.
Step 3: Last choice (extreme emergency) - standing water. Boil as long as practical to kill organisms.
Step 4: Keep water covered while boiling to prevent airborne pathogen contamination.
Step 5: Filter boiled standing water through cloth to remove dead vectors.
Step 6: Use water purification tablets in all cases as additional safety measure.
warnings: Standing water allows easy survival of vectors and germs
No guarantee that any treatment makes contaminated water completely safe
Vectors in standing water can survive and transmit disease even after some treatment
